mapper.insert: insert into t_equipment (id, equipment_sn, equipment_type_id, network_room_id, create_time, creator_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{equipmentSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into t_equipment
id,
equipment_sn,
equipment_type_id,
create_time,
creator_id,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{equipmentSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update t_equipment
equipment_sn = #{equipmentSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
equipment_type_id = #{equipmentTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT count(id) FROM t_equipment WHERE equipment_sn = #{equipmentSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT t1.id id, t1.equipment_sn equipment_sn, t2.equipment_name equipment_name, t1.create_time create_time FROM t_equipment t1 LEFT JOIN t_equipment_type t2 ON t1. equipment_type_id = t2.id
equipment_sn like concat("%",#{queryText},"%")
ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC

select count(*) from t_equipment
equipment_sn like concat("%",#{queryText},"%")
ORDER BY create_time ASC
